Uses of Class
shared.locations.VertexLocation

  • Packages that use VertexLocation 
    Package Description
    model.map  
    serverProxy  
    shared.locations  

    • Uses of VertexLocation in model.map

      Methods in model.map with parameters of type VertexLocation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MapManager.placeSettlement(VertexLocation vertex, int player)
      Places a settlement on the given vertex, belonging to the indicated player
      void MapManager.upgradeSettlement(VertexLocation vertex, int player)
      Upgrades the state of the indicated vertex from settlement to city, the player id plays a minor role of action validation, may be removed in the future

    • Uses of VertexLocation in serverProxy

      Methods in serverProxy with parameters of type VertexLocation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameModelJSON ServerProxy.buildCity(int playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      Builds a city at the specified HexLocation.
      GameModelJSON RealProxy.buildCity(int playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation) 
      GameModelJSON MockProxy.buildCity(int playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation) 
      GameModelJSON ServerProxy.buildSettlement(int playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation, boolean free)
      Builds a settlement at the specified HexLocation.
      GameModelJSON RealProxy.buildSettlement(int playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation, boolean free) 
      GameModelJSON MockProxy.buildSettlement(int playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation, boolean free) 

    • Uses of VertexLocation in shared.locations

      Methods in shared.locations that return VertexLocation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VertexLocation VertexLocation.getNormalizedLocation()
      Returns a canonical (i.e., unique) value for this vertex location.
